attributes.contentHtml:
Yeah, he did shit- but he's 11. He's not exactly going to learn from an announcement that over 40 thousand people saw, he's going to keep going because he doesn't care about his reputation (because he's a fucking child).

Yeah, he did bad stuff but publicly shaming him won't help whatsoever.

attributes.bio: my cover is a cars meme I found on facebook

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer

attributes.contentHtml: Tomas An 11 year old should not be running a hosting company and handling customer data like bad. He is not professional at all. Instead, he should be experimenting with linux and servers privately, not handling customer data. This would at least learn him how to work with linux properly as he clearly hasn't got a clue.
